item.passage: “One day, in retrospect, the years of struggle will strike you as the most beautiful.”
“I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.”
“One does not become enlightened by imaging figures of light, but by making ths darkness conscious.”
“The most dangerous psychological mistake is the projection of the shadow on to others: this is the root of almost all conflicts.”
“Nobody can make you feel inferior without your permission.”
“When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.”
“Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of the human freedoms—to choose one’s attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one’s own way.”
“But there was no need to be ashamed of tears, for tears bore witness that a man had the greatest of courage, the courage to suffer.”
“Life is never made unbearable by circumstances, but only by lack of meaning and purpose.”
"Man is the only animal for whom his own existence is a problem which he has to solve."
“It isn't normal to know what we want. It is a rare and difficult psychological achievement.”
“In a word, growth and improvement can come through pain and conflict.”
“Meanings are not determined by situations, but we determine ourselves by the meanings we give to situations.”
“Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.”
“The curious paradox is that when I accept myself just as I am, then I can change.”
“I'm not perfect... But I'm enough.”
“The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek.”
“Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors for you where there were only walls.”
“All the gods, all the heavens, all the hells, are within you.”
“If you don't know where you are going, you'll end up someplace else”
“If you can change your mind, you can change your life.”
“The great use of life is to spend it for something that will outlast it.”
“If you want truly to understand something, try to change it.”
“The human mind is an organ for the discovery of truths rather than of falsehoods.”
“Nothing in life is to be feared. It is only to be understood.”
“I don't believe people are looking for the meaning of life as much as they are looking for the experience of being alive.”
